summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of AI Viral Flow. All 12 requested steps executed perfectly including viral mode activation, theme selection, project generation, editor verification, and viral visuals generation trigger.
passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate - 5/5 tests passed)
Dashboard loads successfully with project cards visible
AI Control Room (Viral Mode) toggle works correctly
Theme selection functionality works (Dark Mode Premium selected via keyboard navigation)
Topic input field accepts 'AI Viral Test' correctly
GENERATE button triggers viral generation successfully
Toast message 'Text Generation Started (Images Manual)' appears correctly
New AI Viral Test project card appears with PROCESSING and VIRAL badges
Editor opens successfully when clicking project card
Slides contain generated text content (5 slides with titles like 'What is the AI Viral Test?', 'Why Go Viral?', 'Get Started Today')
Slides have NO background images as expected (Draft status with plain white/gray background)
AI CONTROL ROOM panel is visible in right sidebar with purple background
GENERATE VIRAL VISUALS button is clickable and functional
Toast message 'Viral Asset Generation Started (Check back in 1 min)' appears after clicking viral visuals button
All UI elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Navigation between dashboard and editor works correctly
Viral mode indicator (AI VIRAL MODE badge) displays correctly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (5/5 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (18/18 features tested successfully)
